SELECT dept.* ,d2.DEPT_NAME AS PARENT_DEPT_NAME FROM rfid_dept dept LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept d2 ON dept.PARENT_DEPT_NO = d2.DEPT_NO WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY dept.dept_level, dept.sort_num
SELECT count(*) FROM rfid_dept dept WHERE 1=1

SELECT T1.dept_no AS dept_no01 , T2.dept_no AS dept_no02 , T3.dept_no AS dept_no03 , T4.dept_no AS dept_no04 , T5.dept_no AS dept_no05 , T6.dept_no AS dept_no06 , T7.dept_no AS dept_no07 , T8.dept_no AS dept_no08 FROM rfid_dept T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T2 ON T1.parent_dept_no = T2.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T3 ON T2.parent_dept_no = T3.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T4 ON T3.parent_dept_no = T4.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T5 ON T4.parent_dept_no = T5.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T6 ON T5.parent_dept_no = T6.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T7 ON T6.parent_dept_no = T7.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T8 ON T7.parent_dept_no = T8.dept_no WHERE 1=1
AND ( T1.dept_no LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR T1.dept_name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') )
AND 1 = 2

SELECT T1.dept_no AS dept_no01 , T2.dept_no AS dept_no02 , T3.dept_no AS dept_no03 , T4.dept_no AS dept_no04 , T5.dept_no AS dept_no05 , T6.dept_no AS dept_no06 , T7.dept_no AS dept_no07 , T8.dept_no AS dept_no08 FROM rfid_dept T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T2 ON T1.dept_no = T2.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T3 ON T2.dept_no = T3.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T4 ON T3.dept_no = T4.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T5 ON T4.dept_no = T5.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T6 ON T5.dept_no = T6.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T7 ON T6.dept_no = T7.parent_dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T8 ON T7.dept_no = T8.parent_dept_no WHERE 1=1
AND ( T1.dept_no LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR T1.dept_name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') )
AND 1 = 2

SELECT dept.* ,T2.dept_name as parent_dept_name ,T3.user_name as dept_head_user_name FROM rfid_dept dept LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_dept T2 ON dept.parent_dept_no = T2.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_user T3 ON dept.dept_head_user_no = T3.user_no WHERE dept.DEPT_NO = #{deptNo}
